## Vector3.toArray() method

Populates the given array or FloatArray from the given index with the successive coordinates of the Vector3

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toArray(array: FloatArray, index?: number): Vector3;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  array | <code>FloatArray</code> | defines the destination array |
|  index | <code>number</code> | defines the offset in the destination array |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Vector3`

the current Vector3
